overview: Three months after the March 2011 disaster in Fukushima, TEPCO, the  electric company operating the nuclear power plant, installed a livecam on  the facilities. The images, on which days and minutes add up, are available  online. Using them for sole visual material, such is the daring challenge  Philippe Rouy has taken up in 4 bâtiments, face à la mer.  (Nicola Féodoroff, FID 2012)
title: 4 Buildings, Facing the Sea
